definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Pepsi-cola is the drink for you.
Jinan Pepsi Cola is facing such a problem in its Carbonated Soft Drink (CSD) market.
sentences.chinese: 濟南百事可樂面對的碳酸飲料市場更是存在這個問題。

sentences.english: Right now you can give your email to Pepsi to be alerted about details.
sentences.chinese: 現在你可以給百事可樂發送郵件進一部瞭解詳情。

sentences.english: I couldn't unstick the Pepsi caps from her garbage disposer.
sentences.chinese: 我無法從她的垃圾處理器中取出卡住的百事可樂罐子。

sentences.english: I don't think you're going just to sell Pepsi-Cola .
sentences.chinese: 我不相信你回去只是賣百事可樂。

sentences.english: Pepsi-Cola and other cola every day.
sentences.chinese: 百事可樂和其他可樂類飲料。

sentences.english: Didit impact the brand of Pepsi?
sentences.chinese: 而該影響力是否也影響了百事可樂的品牌？

sentences.english: Thirty-three years ago, Pepsi-Cola was the No. 2-selling cola in the U.S. market.
sentences.chinese: 33年前，百事可樂是美國市場第二位的可樂品牌。

sentences.english: Pepsi and coke have been arch-rivals for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂和百事可樂已夙敵了很久。

sentences.english: She drank too much Diet Pepsi.
sentences.chinese: 她還喝了太多無糖百事可樂。

sentences.english: L don't think you're going to Odessa to sell Pepsi-Cola .
sentences.chinese: 我不相信你回去只是賣百事可樂。

definition: to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
turtle jelly, medicine made with powdered turtle shell and herbs/a similar product made without turtle shell and consumed as a dessert

pinyin: Ke3 kou3 Ke3 le4 Gong1 si1
